sentences.en: Donna left school and went to art college.
sentences.cn: 唐娜中学毕业后进了艺术学院。

sentences.en: Faculty members complain that their students are unprepared to do college-level work.
sentences.cn: 学院的老师们抱怨说他们的学生还很不适应大学的课业。

sentences.en: He majored in finance at Claremont Men's College in California.
sentences.cn: 他在加利福尼亚州的克莱尔蒙特男子学院主修金融专业。

sentences.en: He only really started going out with girls at college.
sentences.cn: 他上大学的时候才真正开始和女孩子约会。

sentences.en: I didn't know what college I wanted to go to.
sentences.cn: 我不知道自己要去上哪所大学.

sentences.en: I never did a stroke of work at college.
sentences.cn: 我在上大学时懒得要命。

sentences.en: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
sentences.cn: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

sentences.en: I've had the hots for him ever since he came to college.
sentences.cn: 自从他来上大学后，我就对他春心萌动。

sentences.en: Novello says college students will spend $4.2 billion yearly on alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 诺韦洛说大学生每年在酒精饮品上会消费掉42亿美元。

sentences.en: She worked to pay the rent while I went to college.
sentences.cn: 在我读大学期间，她打工挣钱来付租金。

sentences.en: Some people who want to go to college still can’t get there.
sentences.cn: 有些想上大学的人仍然无法如愿。

sentences.en: South Point College does not grade the students' work.
sentences.cn: 南点学院不对学生的作业评分。

sentences.en: The college has few ways to assess the quality of education overall.
sentences.cn: 总体看来,这所大学评估教育质量的方法寥寥无几.

sentences.en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: They attended college together at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.cn: 他们一起就读于宾夕法尼亚大学。

sentences.en: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

words.tran_cn: 学院的；社团的；大学生的
大学的；学院的；大学生的
学院的学生；学院的一员

phrases.tran_cn: 大学毕业生；大专以上学历
n. 两年制专科学校，大专

trans.tran_cn: 大学，学院，技术专科学校，高等专科学校，学院师生，公学，学会
trans.tran_en: a school for advanced education, especially in a particular profession or skill
